summary: REQ-9 and REQ-10 appear implemented: the Maui app shell header is now text-only with no logo , and the HTML entrypoint no longer references the generated Maui icon as a favicon. Some unrelated UI behavior may have been changed (navigation and footer content) that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Navigation change: MauiNav now displays only the Dashboard tab and removes the Reference Capture link.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to remove logo/icon rendering in the header and remove the generated app-icon favicon reference; it did not request navigation changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx": "Navigation component displaying only the Dashboard tab... with the Reference Capture link removed.")

hallucinated_features.description: Footer content includes a marketing-style line and external link ("Built with love using caffeine.ai").
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not ask for footer content or external links; only header logo/icon removal and favicon changes.
